DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim compare change blood sugar number period carbohydrate supplementation need treat low blood sugar , two different treatment NN1250 ( insulin degludec ) , soluble insulin basal analogue ( SIBA ) subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assessing Changes Blood Sugar Number Periods Where Supplementation Carbohydrate Needed Treat Low Blood Sugar , During Two Different Treatment Regimens NN1250 Type 1 Diabetics
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus least 12 month Glycosylated haemoglobin ( HbA1c ) 7.5 9 % ( inclusive ) Donation loss 500 ml blood plasma within three month prior trial Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per day ) able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inhouse period Prior current treatment metformin thiazolidinediones
